base_description: Black spherical object with gold accents, compact size.
part_description: Consists of a central black sphere, surrounded by concentric black rings, with gold accents on top and bottom. The base is a white, vase-like structure supporting the entire assembly.
internal_interaction_description: The black sphere is centrally located and encircled by multiple black rings, possibly representing orbital paths. Gold accents may serve as connectors or decorative elements, ensuring structural integrity. The base supports the upper spherical structure, allowing it to stand upright and stable.
external_interaction_description: The object can interact with other decorative items as a centerpiece. Its stable base allows it to be placed on flat surfaces. The design suggests it might be used for educational or demonstrative purposes, illustrating orbital mechanics or celestial movements.
